item.title: I Love Music - Browse Issue
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - I Love Music on Sonos Outage

We've identified a problem with I Love Music on Sonos and are working with them on a fix. You may not be able to browse I Love Music menus in the Sonos app until it's resolved Summary: Identified issue with I Love Music on Sonos, browsing menus may be affected. Working on a fix.

Mar 7, 14:17 UTC
Identified - We've identified a problem with I Love Music on Sonos and are working with them on a fix. You may not be able to browse I Love Music menus in the Sonos app until it's resolved

item.title: Sonos Radio - Audio Interruptions
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Sonos Radio Service Disruption

We've identified a problem with Sonos Radio and are working towards a fix. You may experience issues playing music from Sonos Radio until it’s resolved. Summary: Sonos Radio is experiencing a major service disruption, causing issues with playing music. The team is actively working on a fix to resolve the problem.

Feb 26, 02:07 UTC
Identified - We've identified a problem with Sonos Radio and are working towards a fix. You may experience issues playing music from Sonos Radio until it’s resolved.

item.title: Klassik Radio Select - Adding Account Issue
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Klassik Radio Select Login Issue

Summary: Users are unable to sign in to their Klassik Radio Select account on Sonos due to a problem being identified. The company is working on a fix.

Feb 22, 11:49 UTC
Identified - We've identified a problem with Klassik Radio Select on Sonos and are working with them on a fix. You may not be able to sign in to your Klassik Radio Select account on Sonos until it’s resolved.

item.title: Familystream - Adding Account Issue
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Familystream Issue on Sonos

Summary: Familystream on Sonos is experiencing a problem that prevents users from adding or signing in to their accounts. The company is working on a fix, and the issue is ongoing.

Feb 22, 10:58 UTC
Monitoring - We've identified a problem with Familystream on Sonos and are working with them on a fix. You may not be able to add or sign in to your Familystream account on Sonos until it’s resolved.

item.content:encoded:

Identified - We've identified a problem with TuneIn on Sonos and are working with them on a fix. You may be unable to start playing music from TuneIn until it’s resolved.

item.title: Sonos Radio - Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
Oct 13, 11:16 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 12, 07:55 UTC
Monitoring - We deployed a fix for the recent Sonos Radio issue yesterday and are actively monitoring the situation. While we work to ensure a smooth experience, you may encounter difficulties when adding Sonos Radio or starting playback from the service. As a temporary solution, please manually check for updates within the Sonos app to ensure it is fully up-to-date.

item.title: Cloud Outage - Adding Account Failure
item.content:encoded:
Sep 22, 08:49 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 21, 07:51 UTC
Investigating - We've identified a problem with our cloud services and are working on a fix. You may experience issues with locating or adding music services until it's resolved. Check our status page for updates while we work to fix this. In the meantime, as a workaround, please manually check for updates within the Sonos app and ensure it is fully up to date, this should re-populate the music service catalog.
